name: Crunchbase
notes: REST API requires Enterprise plan. Free tier: 5 profile views/day.

name: PitchBook
notes: Institutional-grade VC/PE data. API access on enterprise contracts.

name: CB Insights
notes: Market intelligence platform. Free newsletter available.

name: Tracxn
notes: Startup tracking across 900+ sectors. Free tier very limited.

name: Dealroom.co
notes: European-focused startup intelligence. API on paid plans.

name: Owler
notes: Community-driven competitive intelligence. Free tier: basic company profiles.

name: AngelList / Wellfound
notes: Startup jobs and fundraising. Formerly AngelList Talent.

name: Mattermark (FullContact)
notes: Mattermark acquired by FullContact. Data enrichment focus now.

name: PrivCo
notes: Private company financials. Academic and enterprise licenses.

name: Startup Genome
notes: Global Startup Ecosystem Report. Policy and ecosystem benchmarking.

name: F6S
notes: Startup deals, grants, accelerator listings.

name: Beauhurst
notes: UK high-growth company data. Academic licenses available.

name: Statista Startups
notes: Statistics portal with startup/VC datasets. Basic access free.

name: Craft.co
notes: Company profiles with supplier/financial data. Free tier limited.

name: The Information
notes: Premium tech journalism. Subscriber-only deep dives.

name: Sifted
notes: European startup news backed by Financial Times.

name: BetaKit
notes: Canadian startup and tech ecosystem news.

name: TechCrunch (Startups)
notes: Startup-specific TechCrunch vertical.

name: VentureBeat (Business)
notes: AI and enterprise tech news.

name: Silicon Republic
notes: Irish/European tech and startup news.

name: StartupBlink
notes: Global startup ecosystem map and ranking.

name: GetLatka
notes: SaaS company revenue and growth data. Free tier limited.

name: SimilarWeb
notes: Website traffic and digital market intelligence. Free: 5 results/metric.

name: ZoomInfo
notes: B2B contact and company intelligence. API on enterprise plans.

name: Crunchbase News
notes: Funding news and startup analysis. Free to read.

name: PitchBook Blog
notes: Free market analysis and VC trend reports.

name: SEC EDGAR
notes: US public company filings. Full-text search available. EDGAR full-text search at efts.sec.gov.

name: SBIR.gov
notes: Small Business Innovation Research awards. Search by topic/keyword.

name: NIH RePORTER
notes: NIH-funded research grants database. REST API available.

name: NSF Awards Search
notes: National Science Foundation funded project search.

name: DARPA
notes: Defense research programs. Check N3, BTO programs for BCI.

name: EU Horizon Europe / CORDIS
notes: EU-funded research project database. Successor to Horizon 2020.

name: Global Corporate Venturing
notes: Corporate VC deal tracking and analysis.

name: Venture Pulse (KPMG)
notes: Quarterly global VC analysis. Summary reports sometimes free.

name: Preqin
notes: Alternative assets data (PE, VC, hedge funds, real estate).

name: Refinitiv (LSEG)
notes: Formerly Thomson Reuters Financial. Now part of LSEG.

name: S&P Capital IQ
notes: Financial data and analytics platform. Institutional pricing.

name: Bloomberg Terminal
notes: Industry-standard financial terminal. ~$24k/year per seat.

name: FactSet
notes: Financial data and software. Institutional pricing.

name: Mergermarket
notes: M&A intelligence and deal flow. Part of ION Analytics.

name: Dealogic
notes: Investment banking deal analytics.

name: Invest Europe
notes: European PE/VC industry data and research. Some reports free.

name: NVCA (National Venture Capital Association)
notes: US VC industry reports and yearbook. Many resources free.

name: ACE (Association for Corporate Growth)
notes: Middle-market M&A and corporate growth community.

name: Grand View Research
notes: Market reports with free summaries and TOC. Full reports paid.

notes: Industry reports. Free sample PDFs available.

name: MarketsandMarkets
notes: Revenue impact and growth opportunity reports. Free summaries.

name: Mordor Intelligence
notes: Market research reports with free summary sections.

name: Allied Market Research
notes: Industry reports. Free summary and infographics.

name: Research and Markets
notes: Largest market research store. Aggregates reports from many publishers.

name: Gartner
notes: Magic Quadrant, Hype Cycle reports. Newsroom RSS free.

name: Forrester
notes: Forrester Wave reports. Blog RSS free.

notes: Free research articles and industry perspectives.

notes: Tech and industry research. Reports downloadable free.
